ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | plusffval.1 | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | plusffval.2 | |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | plusffval.3 | |- .+^ = ( +f ` G ) |
| 4 |  | #P_oveq12 | |- ( ( x = X /\ y = Y ) -> ( x .+ y ) = ( X .+ Y ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_plusffval | |- .+^ = ( x e. B , y e. B |-> ( x .+ y ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( X .+ Y ) e. _V |
| 7 | 4, 5, 6 | #P_ovmpt2a | |- ( ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .+^ Y ) = ( X .+ Y ) ) |
